# Documentation - Pre-trained AI/ML (VAI)
| 0     | 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|:-------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Workload location | Organization only workloads                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |

| Audited operations | HTTP API that translates input text and returns translated text Get supported language pairs (HTTP GET) Detect language for a given input text (HTTP GET) Create glossaries (HTTP POST) Get glossaries (HTTP GET) List glossaries (HTTP GET) Delete glossary (HTTP POST) Get operations (HTTP GET) List operations (HTTP GET) gRPC call that translates input text and returns translated text Detect language for a given input text (gRPC) Get supported language pairs (gRPC) Translate a document (gRPC) Create glossaries (gRPC) Get glossaries (gRPC) List glossaries (gRPC) Delete glossary (gRPC) Get operations (gRPC) List operations (gRPC) Detect text in a batch of files (gRPC) Detect text in image file (gRPC) Detect text in file (gRPC) Transcribe speech to text (gRPC) Transcribe streaming speech to text (gRPC) Get status of AIML Pre-trained APIs (HTTP GET) Enable the AIML Pre-trained APIs (HTTP POST) Disable the AIML Pre-trained APIs (HTTP POST) |
